channel.title: 64 bit help (pi)
channel.description:
Ok my 64 bit client keeps automatically closing after like 3 minutes and saying this error this has never happened before and i have always used 64 bit anyone know what this error means?
[code]Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at java.applet.Applet.getAppletContext(Unknown Source) at client.getAppletContext(client.java:2752) at java.awt.DefaultKeyboardFocusManager.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Component.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.SequencedEvent.dispatch(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventQueue.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpOneEventForFilters(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForFilter(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEventsForHierarchy(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.pumpEvents(Unknown Source) at java.awt.EventDispatchThread.run(Unknown Source) # # A fatal error has been detected by the Java Runtime Environment: # # Internal Error (nmethod.cpp:1836), pid=3168, tid=4244 # Error: guarantee(cont_offset != 0,"unhandled implicit exception in compiled c ode") # # JRE version: 6.0_20-b02 # Java VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (16.3-b01 mixed mode windows-x86 ) # An error report file with more information is saved as: # C:\Users\Andrew's\Dropbox\ExtremeX-V1.1\EX, V1.1\bin\hs_err_pid3168.log # # If you would like to submit a bug report, please visit: # http://java.sun.com/webapps/bugreport/crash.jsp # Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
My jdk is 21 and my client run code is [code]@echo off cd ./bin/ "C:/Program files (x86)/java/jre6/bin/java" -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code]

item.title: 64 bit help (pi)
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“vamp256, post:2, topic:394213”]Theres some method you use that seems to make the client crash…

"unhandled implicit exception in compiled c ode")

Not sure what though[/quote]
Well idk whats making the client crash ):

Read full topic

item.description:

Ok my 64 bit client keeps automatically closing after like 3 minutes and saying this error this has never happened before and i have always used 64 bit anyone know what this error means?

[code]Exception in thread “AWT-EventQueue-0” java.lang.NullPointerException

ode")
